attributes.action: grant free dental care to anyone that is still in education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i personally am a 14 year old boy who is still in education, and earlier this year i was told that i need braces. at first i thought ok i need braces so what, but then i found out that i have to pay just under £2000 for them. Now my family does not have that sort of money, so i have made this petition so that hopefully there will be free dental care for everyone in education as £2000 for braces is outrageous
